message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can see you're a serious buyer, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11500. Is that something you'd be comfortable with?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. Can you consider that price?

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing money. I'm counteroffering at $11250. This is my final offer, so I hope you can meet me at this price.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. I'm not willing to go any higher, so I hope we can meet at this price.
